definition: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora/CITES
pinyin: Bin1 wei1 Ye3 sheng1 Dong4 Zhi2 wu4 zhong3 Guo2 ji4 Mao4 yi4 Gong1 yue1
containing_words.word: 濒危野生动植物种国际贸易公约

definition: Wikispecies, (species.wikimedia.org), online project to catalog all known species

sentences.english: The red wolf has federally endangered status throughout its 29-state historic range.
sentences.chinese: 红狼在联邦的29个州已经是濒临灭绝的物种。

sentences.english: Indeed it was giraffe and deer that have woven the new dreamtime for all to partake in.
sentences.chinese: 的确，正是长颈鹿与鹿为所有物种编织了这一新梦想。

sentences.english: Area Serai, intertwined vines and plant species richness.
sentences.chinese: 景区林郁苍茏，藤蔓交织，植物物种丰富。

sentences.english: Newcomers include Japanese knotweed and Amur bush honeysuckle.
sentences.chinese: 外来物种包括日本紫菀和灌木忍冬。

sentences.english: What you are born with or were born with, as species, is all we have.
sentences.chinese: 作为人的物种，只有与生俱来的东西。

sentences.english: Then they counted the species above it.
sentences.chinese: 之后他们计算了铱层上的物种。

sentences.english: Called a bryophyte, the plant belongs to the same family as mosses and liverworts.
sentences.chinese: 这个新物种隶属于苔类植物科。

sentences.english: Listing species is the beginning of that essential process, " Attenborough said in a statement accompanying the report.
sentences.chinese: 编制物种名录是保护物种这一重要进程的开始。

sentences.english: Listing species is the beginning of that essential process, " Attenborough said in a statement accompanying the report.
sentences.chinese: 编制物种名录是保护物种这一重要进程的开始。

sentences.english: The animal represents the last species of a kind of deep-water clam.
sentences.chinese: 这种动物是一种深水蚌类的最后物种。

sentences.english: However, the species density on shrubby layer would be varied when the slope aspect changes.
sentences.chinese: 坡向对于灌木层物种密度也有一定影响。

sentences.english: The rhino, which is almost extinct, with its extraordinary horns and bad temper.
sentences.chinese: 犀牛，几乎灭绝的物种，有着神奇的犀角和暴脾气。

sentences.english: How to protect endangered species is a multi-faceted issue.
sentences.chinese: 如何保护濒危物种是一个涉及到多方面因素的问题。
丹尼索万人是新的人类物种？
物种之间的竞争是频率制约的。

sentences.english: Many species of invertebrate have shells or skeletons made of calcium carbonate.
sentences.chinese: 无脊椎类的好多物种有碳酸钙质的外壳或骨骼。

definition: population (of a species)/community (of animals or plants)
mammals/also written 哺乳動物|哺乳动物
to extinguish/to become extinct/to die out
